The beach.title: The beach
The beach.description: You are standing on a white sandy beach. All around you are pieces of driftwood that have washed onto the sand during a recent storm. Out to sea you can see the sails of your ship where your crew are waiting for you signal.

Green grove.title: Green grove
Green grove.description: You have entered a little clearing of trees. You can tell that somebody has been here before. In the middle of the clearing is a statue that looks quite interesting.

South beach.title: South beach
South beach.description: Yet another beautiful sandy beach. The water looks cool and inviting.

Valley trail.title: Valley trail
Valley trail.description: The trail has led you into a little valley.

east.description: You notice that on the trail to the <> is rather scary looking bear.

Bridge west.title: Bridge west
Bridge west.description: You are on the western side of a river.

east.description: Somebody has made a bridge accross the river using planks of wood and rope. That was some time ago though and it looks a little bit dangerous.

Southern tip.title: Southern tip
Southern tip.description: This is the south tip of the island. A little way out to see are some jagged rocks on which there rests a shipwreck. Although it will never sail again the ship looks to be in relatively good condition.

Shipwreck.title: Shipwreck
Shipwreck.description: Standing on the deck of the ship you notice many pieces of the ships materials scattered around. In the middle of the deck is a hatch which looks as though it leads below.

A net.name: A net
A net.description: It's a fishing net. Looks pretty good for catching fish.
A net.insitu: On the ground you can see a <>

Marshes.title: Marshes
Marshes.description: You are approaching a marshy area at the mouth of a river.

Bridge east.title: Bridge east
Bridge east.description: You are now on the eastern side of the river.

west.description: The bridge that you mended lies to the <>.

Little bay.title: Little bay
Little bay.description: You have come to a little bay. The water is calm and protected from the surrounding seas. Looking into the water you can see schools of fish swimming around.

actions.script:
game.goTo("Shipwreck")
game.error("You dive into the water and swim to the shipwreck")

gameOverview:
You have been left on a deserted island by your pirate comrads. Your task is to locate the hidden treasure and send a signal to them once you have it. You will not be rescued until you find it.

Why only you? Who knows what dangers lurk on this mysterious island. They selected you because you were the smartest, strongest and bravest of their crew. Thanks a lot!
